price: 69. Eet dus van de oorlogsbuit die jullie hebben verkregen, wettig en goed. En vrees Allah, zeker, Allah is Genadevol, Barmhartig.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā ghanim'tum ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
